text: Rammstein is a German Neue Deutsche Härte band formed in Berlin in 1994. The band members are Till Lindemann, who is the singer; Richard Z. Kruspe, who plays the lead guitar and is a backing singer; Paul H. Landers, who plays the rhythm guitar and is also a backing singer; Oliver Riedel, who plays the bass; Christoph Schneider, who plays the drums and electronic musical instruments; and Christian Lorenz, who plays the keyboard (also known as an electronic piano). They mostly sing in German, although they have made a couple of songs in the English, Spanish and Russian. As of 2005, they had sold over 10 million records around the world, and have made a total of 8 albums. Rammstein's music is published by Universal Music Group. Since the band was created, they have had no members join or leave. == Band members == *Richard Z. Kruspe - lead guitar, backing vocals *Paul H. Landers - rhythm guitar, backing vocals *Till Lindemann - lead vocals, harmonica *Oliver "Ollie" Riedel - bass *Christoph "Doom" Schneider - drums, percussion *Christian "Flake" Lorenz - keyboards, synthesizers, samples == Discography == ===Studio albums=== *Herzeleid (1995) *Sehnsucht (1997) *Mutter (2001) *Reise, Reise (2004) *Rosenrot (2005) *Liebe ist für alle da (2009) *Untitled Rammstein album (2019) *Zeit (2022) ===Live albums=== *Live aus Berlin (1999) *Völkerball (2006) *Rammstein: Paris (2017) == References == Category:1994 establishments in Germany Category:German heavy metal bands Category:Musical groups established in 1994 Category:1990s German music groups Category:2000s German music groups Category:2010s German music groups
title: Rammstein
